name: 2D Action Shooter
description:
The girl chosen by villagers must fight monsters.

She must travel the world and find the demon king to defeat.

She would be able to  defeat the demon king？

How to play 

↑↓→←　up,  down,  right,  left

Z  bullet

X  magic

C  dash  

V  potion

F  inventory

Z + X  the magic of light  (if magic bar is full)

Esc   continue

            pause 

           quit      

Or  Xbox controller
